message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CC

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) because it deals with sentiment analysis and text classification, which are both sub-fields of natural language processing. Additionally, the paper mentions tf-idf, a common technique used in information retrieval, which falls under the purview of cs.IR (Information Retrieval).

The paper's focus on supervised learning and its comparison to baseline weighting schemes suggests that it may also be relevant to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper's mention of robustness and its ability to work well on both snippets and longer documents may indicate relevance to cs.CC (Computational Complexity) as well.
